greetings.message: Hi {customer_name}! üëã I'm your AI shopping assistant. I can help with order #{order_id} or any questions you have. What brings you here today?

acknowledgments.message: I completely understand your concern about {issue_description}. Let me look into this right away and find the best solution for you.
I'm truly sorry for the frustration this has caused, {customer_name}. Your satisfaction is our priority, and I'm here to make this right.
Thank you for your patience while I review your {item_type}. I'm working on finding the perfect solution for you.

information_gathering.message: To assist you better, could you please provide your order number? You can find it in your confirmation email or account dashboard.

solutions_offered.message: Great news! I can send you {new_product} with free expedited shipping. It will arrive in {delivery_days} days. Your return label will be emailed immediately. Sound good?
I've processed a full refund of ${refund_amount} to your {payment_method}. You'll see it in {processing_days} business days. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.

confirmations.message: ‚úÖ All done! I've {action_taken}. You'll receive a confirmation email at {email} within the next few minutes. Reference number: {reference_number}

recommendations.message: Looking at your order history, you typically wear {typical_size} in {category}. For this {brand} item, I'd recommend {recommended_size} based on {reason}.

apologies.message: I'm so sorry your {product_name} arrived defective. This absolutely shouldn't have happened. Let me make this right immediately.
I sincerely apologize for the delay with your order. I know how frustrating waiting can be. Let me check the status and see how we can expedite this for you.

escalations.message: I'd like to connect you with {agent_name}, one of our senior specialists who can give you personalized attention. They're ready to help you now!
This situation needs special attention. Let me transfer you to our {department} team who handles these cases specifically. One moment please!
Of course! I completely understand. Let me connect you with {role} right away. Please hold for just a moment.
